main event: Multiple sightings of an object resembling a star observed over two days in Okinawa.
interesting points: The object was described as the same size and color as a star,The observation occurred at dusk on both dates,The object moved eastbound at a speed of 15-30 degrees per second,The sightings lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes,The project concluded that the objects were probably meteors based on their description.
